content: Where in mathlib can I find the (appropriate generalisation) of the fact that if a sequence converges, then any subsequence of it also converges to the same value?
(I don't know off-hand), but it's usually a good idea to try to write out the statement of the theorem you want as Lean code, which then may let some of the automated search tools help you find it.
Tainnor has marked this topic as resolved.
